item.title: No title
item.description: This new season marks one year since we started Hot Shots. We were lucky to have a good group of kids and parents grouped together. In this short time, the boys have gone from playing 6 versus 6 to now 9 versus 9. This is a big jump, and while they're going to be playing at a higher level, we’ve decided it’s time to put more thought into how the team is coached.

item.title: Vincent Kompany - Ultimate Defender
item.description:
Vincent Kompany - Ultimate Defender

Great video showing how good defenders stay active and on the ball. Important to watch because kids can treat defense as a passive part of the game.

item.title: The Wall Passes Soccer Passing Drill - SoccerDrillsDaily
item.description:
The Wall Passes Soccer Passing Drill - SoccerDrillsDaily

This is great video to help you work on your passing skills.
